sentences.en: As we approached the summit we were vouchsafed a rare vision.
sentences.cn: 快到山顶时，我们有幸看到了难得一见的景象。

sentences.en: Collectors will pay $50,000 to $1 million for a rare specimen.
sentences.cn: 收藏家们会花5万到100万美元去购入一份稀有标本。

sentences.en: Ferris has a rare ability to record her observations on paper.
sentences.cn: 费里斯具备把自己的观察结果记录下来的超强能力。

sentences.en: He was prompted to a rare outburst of feeling.
sentences.cn: 他被惹得情绪非常激动，这很少见。

sentences.en: Heart attacks were extremely rare in babies, he said.
sentences.cn: 婴儿极少有心脏病发作的情况，他说。

sentences.en: I only saw Helen on the rare occasions when I went into her shop.
sentences.cn: 我只有偶尔去海伦店里时才会见到她。

sentences.en: I specifically asked for this steak rare.
sentences.cn: 我明确要求把这份牛排煎得偏生一些。

sentences.en: It is very rare for her to miss a day at school.
sentences.cn: 她很少有哪一天不上学的。

sentences.en: It remained an exceptionally rare book until it was reprinted in 1918.
sentences.cn: 在1918年再版之前，这本书一直非常罕见。

sentences.en: It was a rare pleasure to see him in action.
It was one of his rare attempts at humour.
sentences.cn: 那是他极不常见的想要表现幽默的一次。

sentences.en: One evening, she made a rare outing to the local discotheque.
sentences.cn: 她有天晚上破天荒地去了一次当地的迪斯科舞厅。

sentences.en: Physical perfection in a human being is exceedingly rare.
sentences.cn: 体貌完美的人极为罕见。

sentences.en: Rare birds preen themselves right in front of your camera.
sentences.cn: 很少有鸟类会在镜头面前梳理自己的羽毛。

sentences.en: These days, the bobby on the beat is a rare sight.
sentences.cn: 现在很少能看到巡逻的警察。

sentences.en: They have replanted many areas with rare and unusual plants.
sentences.cn: 他们在许多地方重新种上了珍稀植物。

sentences.en: Thick tuna steaks are eaten rare, like beef.
sentences.cn: 像牛肉一样，厚的金枪鱼排做到半熟即可食用。

sentences.en: This species of plant is becoming increasingly rare.

words.tran_cn: 渴望（rare的ing形式）；用后腿站起

trans.tran_cn: 稀少的，罕见的，珍贵的，半熟的，极好的
trans.tran_en: not seen or found very often, or not happening very often
